messages.title: SECURING A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: A Conservative Government will back hardworking families by: Growing the economy so it delivers wage rises. Cutting your taxes & delivering tax-free childcare. Creating more excellent school places. Making sure welfare always makes work pay. Helping pensioners with over-65s savings bonds.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Growing the economy to deliver wage rises.
Cutting taxes and delivering tax-free childcare.
Making sure welfare always makes work pay.
Helping pensioners with over-65s savings bonds.

mentions.tacticalSituation: THE NEXT ELECTION: THE CLEAREST CHOICE IN A GENERATION. With the Conservatives; Under Labour

issues.economy: Income tax cut for 30m people. Getting immigration under control. The deficit eliminated
